arStrings.szText: Faith in Blood
A familiar-looking man furtively attempts to get your attention.

Petr, the father of the boy Sister Octavia saved, covertly slipped me a letter from Sister Octavia. It seems the demon from the sewers has taken her as its next victim. 

She is being hidden in Kvera's cellar. I must go to her quickly.
Enter the Ominous Cellar

Petr, the father of the boy Sister Octavia saved, covertly slipped me a letter from Sister Octavia. It seems the demon from the sewers has taken her as its next victim. 

She is being hidden in Kvera's cellar. I must go to her quickly.
Speak with Sister Octavia

Octavia is fighting the demon with all her strength, but it falls to me to perform a Cathedral of Light exorcism ritual. 

First I must head to the town of Margrave and retrieve a chalice, which may require some... subterfuge.
Speak with Priest Matvey
The priest has instructed me to take a piece of burning wood from the pyre in the center of Margrave and drop it into the blood-filled chalice.
Place a piece of pyre wood in the chalice
Petr is placing the chalice, and I must prepare to successfully complete an exorcism ritual I have only witnessed twice. Sister Octavia's life is in my hands. I cannot fail her.
Enter the Ominous Cellar
The blood-filled chalice ignited in a burst of flame, and left a dark stain on the inside of the bowl. It is ready for the exorcism ritual. I must return to Kyovashad quickly.
Return to Kvera's home
The exorcism was interrupted by the priest from Margrave, but it still succeeded in forcing the demon out of Sister Octavia. She wants to speak to me outside.
Speak with Sister Octavia

The priest in Margrave has begrudgingly given me a chalice, but it must be "anointed with the blood of sinners".

He pointed me towards deserving bandits to the east of the town.
Fill the chalice with Bandit blood
The chalice is filled, I should return to the priest in Margrave.
Return to Priest Matvey
The blood-filled chalice ignited in a burst of flame, and left a dark stain on the inside of the bowl. It is ready for the exorcism ritual. I must return to Kyovashad quickly.
Speak with Petr
The exorcism was interrupted by the priest from Margrave, but it still succeeded in forcing the demon out of Sister Octavia. She wants to speak to me outside.
Meet Sister Octavia outside

Petr, the father of the boy Sister Octavia saved, covertly slipped me a letter from Sister Octavia. It seems the demon from the sewers has taken her as its next victim. 

She is being hidden in Kvera's cellar. I must go to her quickly.
Speak with Sister Octavia
Pick up Sister Octavia's Prayer Book

Octavia is fighting the demon with all her strength, but it falls to me to perform a Cathedral of Light exorcism ritual. 

First I must head to the town of Margrave and retrieve a chalice, which may require some... subterfuge.
Speak with Priest Matvey
Pick up the Silver Chalice
